item.title: SC(JGK) Copper Cable Lug (Peephole)
item.description: Introduction Model: SC(JGK) Material: Copper Appearance: Tin plated Working Temperature: -55℃~150℃ Feature: Peephole design, you can observe whether the threading is in place Application: There products are suitable for the connection of copper conductors (section 1.5mm²-1000mm²) in power cable with electronic equiment they are made of copper tube and coated with tin. Drawing Specification Model meaning: SC + cable square(mm²) + aperture size(mm) The following table is the latest size.

item.title: BLMT Mechanical Aluminium Lug
item.description: Introduction Model: BLMT Material: Tin-plated aluminum alloy Operating temperature: -55°C to 155°C -67°F to 311°F Standard: GB/T 2314 IEC 61238-1 Torque terminals are specially designed to handle connections between conductors and equipment. Unique shear bolt mechanism provides consistent and reliable stops. Ultra-fast and ultra-efficient compared to conventional crimping hooks, and ensures a consistent predetermined shear moment and compression force. Torque terminals are constructed of tin-plated aluminum alloy and have internal grooved walls.

item.title: BSMB Mechanical Aluminium Lug
item.description: Introduction Model: BSMB Standard Test: Passed the IEC61238-1 class A test, with good transition and short-term current impact resistance Replacing traditional crimping with twist-off screws Structure Main body: Special aluminum alloy material, forging process, surface tin plating, coating > 7μm Torque bolts: Machined by CNC lathe with higher precision Intermediate baffle: The product is divided into oil blocking type and non-oil blocking type, only the oil blocking type has a baffle plate Beading: From BSM-500/630, the connecting pipe does not have beading Features Wide range of applications: suitable for wires from 10mm² to 1000mm², and can be used with almost all types of wires and materials; Pre-constructed design: perfect for heavy-duty cable accessories up to 42KV; Reliable electrical connection performance: Press the conductor into the inner bolt of the wiring tube with the setting torque screw; Easy installation: compact design, easy to install with standard socket wrench; Specification The following table is the latest size.
